title: Taxonomy Registry Schema
description: JSON Schema for the taxonomy registry. Provides a discovery mechanism for available taxonomies, allowing users to select which taxonomy to use at runtime.

registry_version.description: Semantic version of the registry format

default_taxonomy.description: ID of the default taxonomy to use if none specified. User can override this at runtime.

taxonomies.description: List of available taxonomies for user selection

taxonomy_entry.description: Metadata for a taxonomy available in the registry

path.description: Relative path to the taxonomy file from taxonomies/ directory

description.description: Brief description of the taxonomy's purpose and scope

tier_count.description: Number of tiers in the taxonomy

book_count.description: Total number of books referenced in the taxonomy

domains.description: List of domains covered by this taxonomy

created_at.description: ISO 8601 timestamp of when taxonomy was created

active.description: Whether this taxonomy is active and available for selection
